title: Amazon | SDE 3 | Hyderabad
content:
**Education:** B.Tech from tier 3 college 
**Years of Experience:** 8.5 years 
**Prior Experience:** Emerging Startup
**Prev Compensation :** 6800000 Base + 8 Lakhs Bonus + 20 Lakhs worth of ESOPS
**Company:** Amazon
**Title/Level:** SDE 3 (L6)
**Location:** Hyderabad
**Base Salary:** INR 90,00,000
**Signing Bonus:** INR 30,00,000 first year. INR 24,00,000 second year.
**Stock bonus:** 100000 USD over 4 years (5% on 1st year, 15% on 2nd Year, 20% for every 6 months after    that)
**Relocation Bonus :** INR 200,000
**Total comp (Salary + Signing Bonus + Stocks):** INR 124,00,000 for 1st year (Excluding Relocation Bonus),
																				INR 126,50,000 for 2nd year,	
																				INR 123,00,000 for 3rd year,
																				INR 123,00,000 for 4th year,
**Benifits:** Amazon benefits
**Details:** Did not have any other competing offer and hence accepted the initial offer by HR (Given the current market situation and my YOE).

title: Amazon | SDE - 1 | Fresher
content:
Education: BTech IT from Tier3 College, Graduated 2023
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 6 Months Internship at Amazon + 3 Months Internship at Early stage startup
Date of the Offer: January 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer 1
Location: Gurugram
Salary: 19 Lakh
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1.5 Lakh Relocation bonus + 6.47 Lakh 1st Year Sign On bonus + 5.18 Lakh 2nd Year Sign On bonus
Stock bonus: 15 Lakh(5% first year + 15% Second Year + 20% Every 6 months after 2nd Year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 27 Lakh for First Year 
Benefits: 4000 monthly for transportation, 1250 monthly Internet reimbursement, 1100 Meal card, Annual Health Checkup and other standard benefits.
Other details: 15( Annual Leave ), 12( Sick  Leave ), 12( Casual Leave ) and 10 (Mandatory and optional holiday)

Confused, given the current market scenario, off campus applications not working out or similar compensations.
